name: monorepo-root
description: Root for the TypeScript pnpm workspace

scripts.clean: rm -rf .pnpm && find . -name tsconfig.tsbuildinfo -type f -exec rm -f {} + && find . -name node_modules -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name dist -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name dist-test -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && echo "Workspace cleaned."
scripts.test: pnpm --filter lending-agent-no-wallet run test && pnpm --filter swapping-agent-no-wallet run test && pnpm --filter pendle-agent run test && pnpm --filter liquidity-agent-no-wallet run test
scripts.start:anvil: pnpm run lint:require-submodule && npx tsx test/start-anvil.ts
scripts.start:mainnet: pnpm run lint:require-submodule && npx tsx test/start-mainnet.ts
